p: Immunoblot fold-change differences and puncta abundance were analyzed by one-way ANOVA with a Sidak’s multiple comparisons test (α = 0.05). All viral titer data was analyzed by one-way ANOVA with a Dunnett’s multiple comparisons test (α = 0.05). Suppression of Atg5 and Atg14 was calculated with a two-tailed t-test (α = 0.05). Grubb’s test for outliers (α = 0.05) was used to determine if specific data points should be excluded from analysis. Data was analyzed using GraphPad Prism 6.
